_args: C:\Users\GR\OneDrive - Georgia Institute of Technology\Projects\Home Monitoring System\Software\WEB_local
_where: C:\Users\GR\OneDrive - Georgia Institute of Technology\Projects\Home Monitoring System\Software\WEB_local
description: Tiny module implementing a pool of connect-style domain-agnostic middleware layers. Runs in the browser and node.js
name: midware-pool

scripts.browser: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs ./midware-pool.js --preamble "/*! midware-pool v${VERSION} - MIT license - https://github.com/h2non/midware-pool */" --mangle --source-map midware-pool.min.js.map --source-map-url http://cdn.rawgit.com/h2non/midware-pool/${VERSION}/midware-pool.min.js.map > midware-pool.min.js
